Uses of Interface
yaak.model.service.ServiceArena

Packages that use ServiceArena
yaak.model This package provides a world environment for domain modeling. 
yaak.model.service This package implements a service-oriented delegation strategy. 
 

Uses of ServiceArena in yaak.model
 

Methods in yaak.model that return ServiceArena
 ServiceArena World.initServices()
          Initialize services, including a default service arena.

          Initialize services, including default agent context and service arena.
 ServiceArena World.getServiceArena()
          Retrieves the service arena.

 class ServiceArenaImpl
